product_overview: HAAR is a premium fashion jewelry e-commerce website with a modern UI inspired by the AMBUSH brand aesthetic, implemented as a React 19 frontend using Vite 6 and TypeScript with Tailwind CSS for styling and integrated AI features.
core_goals: Deliver a modern, artistic, and responsive e-commerce frontend focusing on fashion jewelry.
Implement comprehensive product browsing with category filters and detailed product views.
Provide seamless user account management including login and profile access.
Support robust shopping cart functionality with smooth add-to-cart and checkout flows.
Establish a scalable design system with consistent branding tokens and effects.
key_features: Slide-out navigation menu with expandable categories (Jewelry, Accessories, Collections).
Artistic home landing page with grain overlay and abstract gradients.
User account management and login view with state persistence.
Product collection view supporting category-based filtering and listing.
Detailed product pages with add-to-cart functionality.
Shopping cart management including item count display and checkout process.
user_flow_summary: Browse products by opening the menu, selecting categories, viewing product collections, and accessing product details.
Add products to the shopping cart from product detail pages and navigate to cart for review.
Access and manage user account from login or user icon to view account details.
Checkout flow starting from the cart, reviewing items, and proceeding to checkout.
validation_criteria: All essential pages implemented as React components: Home, Collection, Product Detail, Cart, and Account.
Navigation menu expands/collapses categories correctly and supports smooth transitions.
Add-to-cart functionality updates cart item counts accurately.
Responsive design works correctly across desktop (1440px), tablet (768px), and mobile (375px) viewports.
Product detail displays accurate and complete product information.
System uses defined design tokens including colors, typography, and visual effects consistently.
Checkout flow initiates correctly from the cart with item review capability.
